name: Rancho Cucamonga, CA
detail: Japanese Tea Garden: Create a tranquil escape with carefully raked gravel, stone lanterns, and minimalist plantings, ideal for meditation and relaxation.

name: Garden City, CA
detail: Mediterranean Retreat: Inspired by the coastal regions of southern Europe, this design incorporates warm colors, terracotta pots, and drought-resistant plants like lavender and rosemary.

name: Ontario, CA
detail: Tuscan Villa: Transport yourself to the Italian countryside with warm colors, terracotta pots, and a mix of olive trees, herbs, and vines climbing up the walls.

name: Irvine, CA
detail: Contemporary Urban: Clean, geometric shapes, concrete or paver walkways, and carefully chosen ornamental grasses create a sleek, modern look suitable for urban environments.

name: Pasadena, CA
detail: Modern Minimalism: Clean lines, neutral tones, and a focus on simplicity characterize this design, with carefully chosen plants and hardscape elements creating an elegant, uncluttered look.

name: Rancho Cucamonga, CA
detail: Desert Oasis: Perfect for arid regions, this design incorporates drought-tolerant plants like succulents and cacti, along with sand or gravel pathways, to create a serene and water-efficient landscape.
